name: Odd-Eyes Phantasma Dragon
desc:
Pendulum Effect
You can discard 1 card; add 1 face-up Dragon Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Odd-Eyes Phantasma Dragon" once per turn.

Monster Effect
If you have 2 cards in your Pendulum Zones and a face-up "Odd-Eyes" Pendulum Monster in your Extra Deck: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. You cannot Pendulum Summon the turn you activate this effect. If this card attacks an opponent's monster, during damage calculation: You can make that opponent's monster lose 1000 ATK for each face-up Pendulum Monster in your Extra Deck, during that damage calculation only. You can only use each monster effect of "Odd-Eyes Phantasma Dragon" once per turn.
